chunks.en: Everyone is on vacation, but I still have to work for four more days. I'm going to throw up....
It was already tiring to work for 10 days in a row, but seeing the other people in the group on vacation today made me even more tired. Sad, I'm going to throw up.
Don't worry, those who can reply to you are not on vacation.
Big weeks and compensatory days off, the favor can never be paid back.

That's not bad, at least you're making money. Look at those who trade A-shares, they have to lose money for 4 consecutive days before the Spring Festival, and they still applaud while eating the ğŸ’© fed by the People's Daily, brimming with a joyful atmosphere.
Those who worked 21 days in a row haven't spoken yet.
You work so hard, the company's efficiency must be very good.
6 more days of work.
@jaycelhz Are you thanking General Kim for his kindness....
Working ten days in a row?? We worked 9 days and still have to work for four more days including today. The whole family is on vacation, but I'm the only one who has to go to work.
Working 11 days in a row here... Don't panic.
I also worked ten days in a row...
@hay313955795 #4 We also worked nine days and still have to work for four more days, everyone is numb.
The day before yesterday, I wanted to order pre-made dishes downstairs, but I found out they were closed from the 1st to the 19th, and they are not doing business with us.
I haven't had a vacation since the 22nd, today is the 13th consecutive day.
Same here. Grateful for the blessings haha
Worked 11 days in a row, never mind, today is another day of slacking off.
Working continuously until February 5th for vacation...
I still have to work on the 30th of the Lunar New Year.
I'm replying to you in the company right now.
Luckily, I'm unemployed, otherwise I'd have to work for many consecutive days.
We also have alternate work weeks... working straight through to New Year's Eve...
